casebody.data:
Michael CACIOPPO, petitioner,
v.
TOWN OF VAIL, COLORADO. No. 13-687. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 24, 2014.

Motion of respondent for leave to file a brief in opposition under seal with redacted copies for the public record granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.
